title: Taffy Apple Salad
ingredients: 1 can (20 oz) pineapple tidbits, drained, reserving liquid
4 apples, unpeeled, cored and cut into small pieces
instructions: In medium saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch, lemon juice, egg, and pineapple juice. Cook until it boils and thickens, stirring continuously, about 10 min. Allow to cool. In a large bowl, combine whipped topping and cooled mixture. Stir in pineapple, apples, marshmallows, and peanuts just before serving.
